item.title: Training a T5 Transformer Model - Generating Titles from ArXiv Paper's Abstracts using ðŸ¤—Transformers
item.author: Author
item.description: Abstract In this article, you will learn how to train a T5 model for text generation - to generate title given a research paper’s abstract or summary using TransformersðŸ¤— Introduction T5 model is a Sequence-to-Sequence model. A Sequence-to-Sequence model is fully capable to perform any text to text conversion task. What does it mean? - It means that a T5 model can take any input text and convert it into any output text.
